title: Work Experience
description: My professional journey through different companies

songs.title: Software Engineer at Opener.
songs.description: Client-facing features, data ingestion, backened development
songs.languages: TypeScript, React, Node.js, GraphQL, SQL, APIs
accomplishments: Built a TypeScript/React bulk-upload system supporting unlimited store ingestion via BullMQ background jobs and Hasura GraphQL APIs. Implemented a Google Placesâ€“driven parsing pipeline to enrich CSV uploads and fully automate store onboarding.

Built a TypeScript-based activity timeline that centralizes all client interactionsâ€”including emails, shipping status updates, stage transitions, and sales-agent notesâ€”offering a clear, end-to-end view of the prospecting and ordering proces for each store.

Developed the handoff/takeover system that transfers ownership of sales leads between agents and clients. Implemented automated emails, database updates, and the companyâ€™s first client-facing CRM tools for managing lead statuses.
Redesigned the user settings page with OpenAI-driven custom sales emails, configurable follow-up schedules backed by email queues, and stronger validation and error handling for required fields.

songs.title: Machine Learning Engineer at MissingWealth
songs.technologies: Google Cloud Platform, Vertex AI, Gemini
accomplishments: Deployed a GCP ETL pipeline (Cloud Storage + Python + Vertex AI) that processed and cleaned 50k+ emails for automated triage.
Built a Gemini-driven zero-/few-shot classifier categorizing emails into four outcomes (Record Found, No Record, More Action Required, Inconclusive) with F1 > 0.90.
Performed confusion matrix analysis and prompt refinement to improve model robustness.
Automated the majority of email triage workflows, reducing manual review effort and improving processing consistency.

songs.title: Data Scientist at RBC
songs.description: Conversational data analysis, machine learning and classfication models
accomplishments: Designed and deployed a production ETL workflow (Python + internal APIs + Postgres) to ingest millions of conversational utterances from RBCâ€™s virtual assistant platform.
Ran BERTopic models with K-Means and HDBSCAN to discover latent conversational topics behind unhandled bot queries, surfacing recurring failure patterns.
Automated topic summarization and data augmentation using OpenAI GPT-3.5 to produce high-quality candidate intents and training examples for model retraining.
Containerized pipelines and deployed on Helios, supporting scheduled runs and reproducible ML environments for ongoing conversation-quality monitoring.

songs.title: Data Analyst at RBC
accomplishments: Automated Excel-based processes using Python, pandas, and scheduled scripts, enabling reproducible and error-free workforce tracking workflows.
Created parameterized SQL models and Superset datasets to support self-serve BI, reducing ad-hoc SQL requests and standardizing metric definitions across teams.
Developed data validation frameworks with cross-table checks, anomaly rules, and reconciliation logic to maintain high data integrity across 10k+ records.
Optimized SQL queries and Superset visualizations to reduce load times and improve usability for analytics stakeholders.

songs.title: Data Governance Analyst at Toyota Canada
accomplishments: Delivered data quality and reporting insights by querying, cleansing, and joining enterprise data across multiple SQL tables for various teams.

Enhanced an internal Python-based rÃ©sumÃ© parsing tool by optimizing text-classification logic, redesigning the weighting system, and enabling customizable keyword weights for hiring managersâ€”resulting in more accurate and intuitive candidate scoring.

Implemented a real-time weather analytics dashboard using Power BI, a Python ETL script, and REST API ingestion; automated extraction, transformation, and loading into a SQL database to support operational decision-making.

title: Personal Projects
description: Side projects and creative coding experiments

songs.title: Portfolio
accomplishments: Built a portfolio website using React and Node.js, hosted on Railway and Vercel.
Curated the user interface to be a spotify inspired portfolio website, with a clean and modern design.
Implemented a audio player that allows the user to listen to the songs and playlists.

songs.title: Autofill Pro
songs.description: Chrome autofill extension for user info and shipping info
songs.technologies: Chrome Extension APIs, Chrome Storage API
accomplishments: Built a full Chrome extension using Manifest V3 that can automatically detect and fill form fields on almost any website by checking patterns in the HTML, placeholders, and surrounding context.
Structured the extension like a mini full-stack app, with separate modules for the UI, storage, and form-filling logic â€” around ~1,000 lines of JavaScript across just three main files.

Created smart dropdown handling that tries multiple matching strategies (exact text, partial matches, fuzzy logic) and even triggers the right events so sites think the user actually selected the option.

Designed a smooth, modern UI with tabs, gradients, keyboard shortcuts (Cmd/Ctrl + Shift + F), a right-click context menu, and clear visual cues (like green highlights) when fields are filled â€” all powered by secure, local-only storage.

songs.title: SeekSwift
songs.description: Real-time weather data visualization with interactive charts

songs.title: TradeWatt
songs.description: Energy market data analysis and price prediction using machine learning
songs.technologies: MongoDB, Neural Networks, Regression, Decision Trees
accomplishments: Built an automated ETL pipeline to ingest, clean, and structure real-time and historical energy market data into MongoDB, enabling consistent and scalable data access for modeling tasks.
Developed a full machine learning workflow that handled data extraction, preprocessing, feature engineering, and model training for energy price prediction.
Implemented and compared multiple predictive modelsâ€”including neural networks, regression approaches, and decision treesâ€”to evaluate performance and optimize model accuracy.
Ran iterative experimentation and hyperparameter tuning, using performance metrics to refine model selection and improve forecasting quality.

songs.title: MindfulMeals
songs.description: Full-stack recipe management app with personalized dietary filtering and recipe discovery
accomplishments: Built a full-stack recipe management app with Firebase authentication, user profiles, and personalized dietary filtering.
Developed a recipe discovery experience with real-time search, an API-powered recipe finder, and curated filtering for dietary needs and ingredients.
Implemented core user features including a grocery cart, saved recipe collections, ratings/reviews, and advanced recipe filtering.
Integrated Firebase + SQL for secure data storage, fast querying, and sync across devices.

title: Skills & Technologies

accomplishments: Developed responsive web applications using React and Vue.js with TypeScript for type safety and improved code quality.
Built reusable component libraries and implemented state management solutions using Redux and Context API.

Created accessible user interfaces following WCAG guidelines and implemented responsive designs for mobile and desktop.

songs.title: Backend Development

accomplishments: Designed and implemented RESTful APIs and GraphQL endpoints for scalable web applications.
Built microservices architecture using Node.js and Python with proper error handling and logging.
Developed authentication and authorization systems using JWT tokens and OAuth 2.0.
Optimized database queries and implemented caching strategies to improve API response times.

songs.title: Database Management

Optimized database queries and created indexes to improve query performance and reduce response times.
Implemented database migrations and version control for schema changes across development and production environments.
Set up database replication and backup strategies to ensure data availability and disaster recovery.
